_header: In the honorance of sweet Jesu
Note:
Translated from French: see Meyer (1889)
XMeyer, Paul. “Version anglaise du poème français des Enfances Jésus Christ.” Romania 18 (1889): 128-31.
Versification: — two-line, four-line — aa with quatrain, abba, at end
_description: The Apocryphal History of the Infancy — 1854 lines

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
IN þe honurance of swete IhesuÞat is louerd ful of
                    vertu…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Þe fader þat sit in triniteHit us graunti þat
                    it so be
BodLauMis108.Attributed Title:
Ici comence le enfaunce Ihesu crist (f. 11ra);
                        Explicit hic infantia Ihesu cristi (f. 22rb)

Horstmann,  Carl.

Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden.
